alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 17 at 9:51AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Snow Showers and Blowing Snow Through the Afternoon... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Light to moderate snow. Accumulations less than an inch in the lower elevations, with and additional 1 to 2 inches on Casper Mountain. Gusty north to northeast wind of 20 mph will cause blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Portions of Natrona County, including Casper Mountain. * WHEN...Now through 3 PM today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel on roadways will be impacted by winter driving conditions and lowered visibility at times today. Blowing and drifting snow will occur. This includes Interstate 25 and US Highway 20/26 from Casper to Hiland.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations
